description: Charge Review History Related Information.  This information is copied from the TAR (temporary transaction) record when a charge in charge review is filed to ETR (permanent transaction).

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CR_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: Charge Review History User ID.  This is the user that performs the activity reflected in this line in the charge review history.

columns.name: CR_HX_TIME
columns.description: Displays the date the recall must be made by.

columns.name: CR_HX_ACTIVITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The charge review history activity category ID for the transaction. Examples include Entry, Review, Resubmit, etc.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Entry


Review


Reentry


Force Resubmit


Transfer


Deletion


Automatic Transfer


Automatic Reentry


Resubmit


Automatic Filing


Defer


Activate


Charge Homed


Automatic Update


Retroadjudication


Pre Charge Review Extension


Request for Billing Information


Skip

columns.name: CR_HX_CONT_LINE_YN
columns.description:
Charge Review History Continuation Flag.  This flag is set to yes if this line is a continuation of the previous line


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: CR_HX_USER_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment associated to a Charge Review history action.
